questions.question: Merge sort follows which strategy?
questions.explanation: It recursively splits and then merges sorted halves.

questions.question: Time complexity of merge sort is:
questions.explanation: There are log n levels and O(n) merge work per level.

questions.question: Auxiliary space complexity is commonly:
questions.explanation: Typical array merges allocate additional linear space.

questions.question: Which operation combines sorted halves?
questions.explanation: The merge step compares front elements from each half.
